A grassroots movement to fight depression.

We are survivors and allies committed to ending mental health stigma in NYC.

contact us

Our Goals

fight stigma through visibility, awareness, and community.

end the stigma

share stories that promote empathy, unity, and awareness.

read our stories

provide accurate information about depression.

learn the facts

Feeling overwhelmed? Call or text NYC Well for confidential help.

If you or someone you know is considering suicide, call the National Suicide Prevention Lifeline at 1-800-273-8255 or, in an emergency, 911.
